answerText: azeotropes[10] Azeotropes deviate from this law, which states that the total vapor pressure of a solution is equal to the partial pressures of each component multiplied by the mole fraction of each component. It is named for a French scientist.
heading: Missiles of October |2011 | 4 | 4 | Science | Chemistry | College
subject: Science
question: Question: Only solutions of three or more parts can form the saddle type of these substances. For 10 points each: [10] Name these substance including solutions like 4% water and 96% ethanol, which have a lower boiling point than both of their parts.
